channel.title: How do I find a secure server for private/secure/anonymous chat using pidgin+OTR
channel.description:
Regarding pidgin + OTR plugin: How do I find a secure server for private/secure/anonymous chat?
Or is any server suitable for that if only the OTR plugin is used? (guess not...)

item.title: How do I find a secure server for private/secure/anonymous chat using pidgin+OTR
item.dc:creator: Hiberts
item.description:
OTR is long to setup and you should avoid many leaks in case you are noob ( in case ) .
I advise you to use another system to comunicate with others : torchat, gpg on deep or clear with email .
It isn’t the best answer but it’s a valid alternative .
